message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a unique item that's worth $1000000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested!

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, $900000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. This is a fair price considering your value and my budget. Let me know what you think.

I understand that you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I have to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a bit more than $850000. I'm counteroffering at $880000. This is my best price, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
